description: Never run out of battery power when you're just about to capture the perfect moment! Time to get extra power for your digital video camera/ camcorder.This is a high capacity / rechargeable Li Ion Battery with premium cell.Type: generic / aftermarket.Color: Black.Voltage: 3.7V.Accessory ONLY. Camera not included.Best replacement for the original Kodak KLIC 7004 / Fuji NP-50 / Pentax DLI68 battery pack.Compatible with the following camera/ camcorder models:Fuji Finepix F50fd / Fujifilm FinePix F70 EXR/Kodak EasyShare V1233 / V1253 / M1093 IS/Pentax Optio A40 / S10/Fuji F75EXR/Fujifilm x20/ Fujifilm FinePix F80EXR / Fujifilm FinePixF600 EXR / F300EXR / F500 EXR / F550 EXR / Fuji Real 3D W3 / X10, Pentax Optio A36, Kodak PLAYTOUCH Video Camera / Kodak PLAYSPORT Video Camera / Zx3.
title: Kodak KLIC-7004 / Fuji Np-50 / Pentax DL-I68 Compatible Li-Ion Battery
